infuse.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to fill something or someone with a particular feeling or quality
infuse.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Her books are infused with humour and wisdom.
These new designers are infusing fresh interest into the New York fashion scene.
infuse.translation[0].definitions[1].def: if you infuse tea or herbs, or if they infuse, you leave them in very hot water while their taste passes into the water
